fileSamples.statement: (WF' : Wf G') (BIN : E' b) (MAPIN : E' \₁ eq b ⊆₁ mapper ↑₁ E) (LABEQ : eq_dom E lab (lab' ∘ mapper)) (INJ : inj_dom E mapper) (BNAQ : eq b ⊆₁ set_compl Acq') (ANREL : eq a ⊆₁ set_compl Rel') (ARW : eq a ⊆₁ R' ∪₁ W') (BRW : eq b ⊆₁ R' ∪₁ W') (SBFROMB : ⦗eq b⦘ ⨾ sb' ⊆ eq b × eq a) (SBSUB : ⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘ ⨾ sb' ⨾ ⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘ ⊆ ⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘ ⨾ mapper ↑ sb ⨾ ⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘) : ⦗E'⦘ ⨾ rpo' ⨾ ⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘ ⊆ mapper ↑ rpo.
fileSamples.proofString:
transitivity (⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘ ⨾ rpo' ⨾ ⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘).
rewrite set_union_minus       with (s := E') (s' := eq b)         at 1; [| basic_solver].
rewrite id_union, !seq_union_l.
apply inclusion_union_l; [reflexivity |].
sin_rewrite reord_rpo_emp; auto.
now rewrite seq_false_l.
unfold rpo at 1.
transitivity ((⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘ ⨾ rpo_imm' ⨾ ⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘)⁺).
rewrite ct_l_upward_closed.
rewrite reord_rpo_imm_start at 1; auto.
basic_solver.
unfold upward_closed.
intros x y RPOIMM YIN.
split.
apply (wf_rpo_immE WF') in RPOIMM.
unfolder in RPOIMM; desf.
intro FALSO; subst x.
eapply reord_rpo_imm_emp; auto.
basic_solver.
assert (IND1 : (⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘ ⨾ rpo_imm' ⨾ ⦗E' \₁ eq b⦘) ⊆ mapper ↑ rpo).
rewrite <- reord_map_rpo_helper; auto.
unfold rpo_imm.
rewrite !seq_union_l, !seq_union_r, !seqA.
seq_rewrite (seq_eqvC (E' \₁ eq b) (R' ∩₁ Rlx')).

∩₁ mapper
   ↑₁ ((fun e : actid => match lab e with

       ∩₁ ((fun e : actid =>

               | _ => false
               end))) ⊆₁ ∅.

fileSamples.statement:

∪ (⦗Acq'⦘ ⨾ mapper ↑ sb ∪ ⦗Acq'⦘ ⨾ mapper ↑ (eq a ∩₁ E) × (eq b ∩₁ E))
∪ (mapper ↑ sb ⨾ ⦗Rel'⦘ ∪ mapper ↑ (eq a ∩₁ E) × (eq b ∩₁ E) ⨾ ⦗Rel'⦘)
∪ (⦗F' ∩₁ Rel'⦘ ⨾ mapper ↑ sb ⨾ ⦗W' ∩₁ Rlx'⦘
   ∪ ⦗F' ∩₁ Rel'⦘ ⨾ mapper ↑ (eq a ∩₁ E) × (eq b ∩₁ E) ⨾ ⦗W' ∩₁ Rlx'⦘)
⊆ mapper ↑ rpo.

rewrite collect_rel_cross.
seq_rewrite <- cross_inter_l.
arewrite (Acq' ∩₁ mapper ↑₁ (eq a ∩₁ E) ⊆₁ ∅);        [| basic_solver].
rewrite set_collect_acq, ANAQ; basic_solver.
arewrite_false (mapper ↑ (eq a ∩₁ E) × (eq b ∩₁ E) ⨾ ⦗Rel'⦘).

seq_rewrite <- cross_inter_r.
arewrite (mapper ↑₁ (eq b ∩₁ E) ∩₁ Rel' ⊆₁ ∅);        [| basic_solver].
rewrite set_interC with (s' := Rel').
rewrite set_collect_rel, BNREL; basic_solver.
arewrite_false (⦗F' ∩₁ Rel'⦘ ⨾ mapper ↑ (eq a ∩₁ E) × (eq b ∩₁ E)).
rewrite collect_rel_cross.
seq_rewrite <- cross_inter_l.
arewrite ((F' ∩₁ Rel') ∩₁ mapper ↑₁ (eq a ∩₁ E) ⊆₁ ∅);        [| basic_solver].
rewrite set_interC with (s := F').
rewrite set_interA, set_collect_is_f, ARW; try basic_solver.
clear.
unfold is_r, is_w, is_f.
basic_solver.
rewrite seq_false_r, seq_false_l, !union_false_r.
rewrite <- reord_map_rpo_helper; auto.
repeat apply union_mori; clear; basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement: (NLOC : ⦗eq a ∩₁ E⦘ ⨾ same_loc ⨾ ⦗eq b ∩₁ E⦘ ⊆ ∅₂) (MAPIN : E' ⊆₁ mapper ↑₁ E) (LABEQ : eq_dom E lab (lab' ∘ mapper)) (SB : sb' ≡ mapper ↑ swap_rel sb (eq b ∩₁ E) (eq a ∩₁ E)) : same_loc' ∩ sb' ⊆ mapper ↑ (same_loc ∩ sb).
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite SB, reord_map_sloc; auto; [| rewrite wf_sbE; basic_solver].
unfold swap_rel.
rewrite inter_union_r, collect_rel_union.
arewrite (same_loc ∩ (sb \ (eq b ∩₁ E) × (eq a ∩₁ E)) ⊆ same_loc ∩ sb).
apply inclusion_union_l; [reflexivity | ].
arewrite (same_loc ∩ (eq a ∩₁ E) × (eq b ∩₁ E) ⊆    ⦗eq a ∩₁ E⦘ ⨾ same_loc ⨾ ⦗eq b ∩₁ E⦘) by basic_solver.
rewrite NLOC, collect_rel_empty.
basic_solver.
